revised_title: Observations on the Lunar Eclipse of June 18, 1722, and Determining the Longitude of Port Royal in Jamaica
tldr: Dr. Halley observes the lunar eclipse of June 18, 1722, and uses the data to determine the longitude of Port Royal in Jamaica. He compares his observations with those made by Captain Bartholomew Candler and Mr. Christfried Kirck, confirming the accuracy of their measurements and the longitude of Port Royal.
